import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import '../styling/updateappointment.css' export default function UpdateAppointment(){ const params = useParams() let id = params.id const[doctor, setDoctor] = useState('') const[date, setDate] = useState('') const[duration, setDuration] = useState('') const[appointment, setAppointment] = useState('') const[doctors, setDoctors] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch('/doctors') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setDoctors(data)) },[]) const allDoctors = doctors.map() return(

Update Appointment

) }
